section.p: Represents the specific reason for which the summarization was generated, such as in response to a request.
The general use case does not require a purpose. Purpose should be utilized when the CCD has a specific purpose such as a transfer, referral, or patient request.

ol.li: CONF-16, CONF-17: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "48764-5" Summary purpose (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)

contains Purpose Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.30)
CONF-19: SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'purpose'.
